AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for logindodherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqda
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for disableacct: Adds /bin/false to shells in login.cfg, if it does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_mvhostsfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002040: CAT I) This rule will disable .rhosts, .shosts, hosts.equiv and shosts.equiv files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_logindodherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000400: CAT II) Set login herald: Set login herald in default stanza, (GEN000410: CAT II) Add DoD login banner in /etc/herald, (AIX00310: CAT II) Ensure /etc/ftpaccess.ctl exist with a herald entry.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_enablexntp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000240,GEN000241: CAT II) This rule will enable the NTP service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_grpusrpass
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000560: CAT I, GEN000300,GEN000880,GEN000320,GEN000380: CAT II) All accounts on the system must have unique user or account names and unique user or account UIDs, (GEN001440: CAT III) All interactive users must be assigned a home directory in the /etc/passwd file.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rootpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000900: CAT III) The root user's home directory must not be the root directory (/), (GEN000020: CAT II) The system must require authentication upon booting into single-user.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002960: CAT II) Access to the cron utility must be controlled using the cron.allow and/or cron.deny file(s), (GEN003060: CAT II) Default system accounts (with the exception of root) must not be listed in the cron.allow file or must be included in the cron.deny file if cron.allow does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_acldodfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple GEN items: CAT II) Change ACL of files and directories as applicable per DoD STIG guideline.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_pathvariable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000940,GEN000945,GEN000950, GEN001600,GEN001605,GEN001610,GEN001840, GEN001845,GEN001850,GEN001900,GEN001901, GEN001902: CAT II) Ensure the root account, run control scripts, and global and local initialization files have absolute paths under the PATH, LIBPATH, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, and LDR_PRELOAD variables.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_usershells
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002120,GEN002140,GEN005000: CAT I II) This rule will check and configure user shells.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rmwwpaths
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000960,GEN003000,GEN003020, GEN003160,GEN003360,GEN003380: CAT II) Ensure that no world writable directories exist in root account's search path. Also, ensure that the cron and at commands' jobs do not execute group or world-writable programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_wwdevfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002280,GEN002300,GEN002480: CAT II) This rule displays world-writable device files, directories and any other files on the system in a non-public directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_fsmntoptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002420,GEN002430: CAT II) Ensure that remotely mounted file systems have nosuid and nodev options.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_catIitems
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000100,GEN004220,GEN006380, GEN008600,GEN008640: CAT I) This rule display results of specified CAT I STIG findings.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_netrules
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000242,GEN001980,GEN002000, GEN007020: CAT II) This rule will check and configure for specified GEN items.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_services
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003700,GEN003810,GEN003815, GEN003865,GEN007840,GEN007850,GEN006060: CAT II) This rule will check and configure inetd and portmap services and DHCP client as per STIG guideline.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_coredumpdev
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003510: CAT II) This rule disables kernel core dumps on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SMTP_ver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004600: CAT I) The SMTP service must be an up-to-date version.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SMTPuucode
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004640: CAT I) The SMTP service must not have a uudecode alias active.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_EnableTrustedLogging
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005440,GEN005460,GEN005480, GEN005450: CAT II) The system must use a remote syslog server (log host).

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SYSattr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (AIX00080: CAT I) The SYSTEM attribute must not be set to NONE for any account.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_account
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000340,GEN000360: CAT II) UIDs and GIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system accounts or non-system groups.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_fipspasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000590,GEN000585,GEN000590: CAT II) The system must use a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm for generating account password hashes.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_lockacc_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000740: CAT II) All non-interactive/automated processing account passwords must be changed at least once per year or be locked. (GEN002640: CAT II) Default system accounts must be disabled or removed. (GEN000280: CAT II) Direct logins must not be permitted to shared, default, application, utility accounts. (GEN000290: CAT II) The system must not have unnecessary accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nfsoptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005880: CAT II) The NFS server must not allow remote root access. (GEN005840: CAT II) The NFS server must be configured to restrict file system access to local hosts. (GEN005820: CAT II) The NFS anonymous UID and GID must be configured to values without permissions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nisplus
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN006400: CAT II) The Network Information System (NIS) protocol must not be used. (GEN006420: CAT II) NIS maps must be protected through hard-to-guess domain names. (GEN006460: CAT II) Any NIS+ server must be operating at security level 2.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nosuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005900: CAT II) The nosuid option must be enabled on all NFS client mounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_passwdhash
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN001475: CAT II) The /etc/group file must not contain any group password hashes.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_remoteconsole
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN001000: CAT II) Remote consoles must be disabled or protected from unauthorized access.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rmtunnel
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007820: CAT II) The system must not have IP tunnels configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005120: CAT II) A dedicated TFTP user account and a non-login shell (such as /bin/false) and a home directory owned by the TFTP user. (GEN005080: CAT I) The TFTP daemon must operate in secure-mode which provides access only to a single directory on the host file system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_forward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004580: CAT II) The system must not use .forward files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_loginout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000740: CAT II) All non-interactive/automated processing account passwords must be locked. (GEN000280: CAT II) Direct logins must not be permitted to shared, default, application, utility accounts. (GEN002640: CAT II) Default system accounts must be disabled or removed.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tcp_icmpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX0210: CAT II) Network option tcp_icmpsecure: Set network option tcp_icmpsecure's value to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX0220: CAT II) Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set network option tcp_tcpsecure's value to 7.

AIXPertEntry.name: dov2d_ip_nfrag
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX0230: CAT II) Network option ip_nfrag: Set network option ip_nfrag's value to 200.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007920: CAT II) Network option ip6srcrouteforward: Set network option ip6srcrouteforward's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007940,GEN003607: CAT II) Network option ipsrcrouterecv: Set network option ipsrcrouterecv's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003601,GEN003612: CAT II) Network option clean_partial_conns: Set network option clean_partial_conns's value to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ip6forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005610: CAT II) Network option ip6forwarding: Set network option ip6forwarding's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipignoreredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007860,GEN003609: CAT II) Network option ipignoreredirects: Set network option ipignoreredirects's value to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007880,GEN003610: CAT II) Network option ipsendredirects: Set network option ipsendredirects's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_directed_broadcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (AIX0200: CAT II) Network option direct_broadcast: Set network option direct_broadcast's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003600: CAT II) Network option ipsrcrouteforward: Set network option ipsrcrouteforward's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003603,GEN003604,GEN007950: CAT II) Network option bcastping: Set network option bcastping's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003605: CAT II) Network option nonlocsrcroute: Set network option nonlocsrcroute's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003606: CAT II) Network option ipsrcroutesend: Set network option ipsrcroutesend's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005600: CAT II) Network option ipforwarding: Set network option ipforwarding's value to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000640: CAT II) Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000640: CAT II) The system must require that passwords contain at least one special character.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000750: CAT II) Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4 that were not in the old password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_defaultpwdintchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000790: CAT II) Default Password Integrity Check: Makes sure that the default password being set is not weak.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chcronfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003280,GEN003300,GEN003320: CAT II) Configure at.allow and at.deny files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000480: CAT II) This rule will set logon delay to 4 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chdodftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004880,GEN004900: CAT II) This rule will ensure the ftpusers file exists.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chetchostsfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN006620: CAT II) This rule will configure hosts.deny and hosts.allow files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chsyslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003660,GEN004460: CAT II) This rule will log auth and info data.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000980: CAT II, GEN001100: CAT I) This rule will disable rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000460: CAT II) This rule will lock account after 3 consecutive failed logon attempts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000540: CAT II) This rule will ensure the system global password configuration files are configured as per password requirements.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000580: CAT II) This rule will ensure all passwords contain a minimum of 14 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000680: CAT II) This rule will ensure passwords contain no more than three consecutive repeating characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000700: CAT II) This rule will ensure the system global password configuration files are configured as per password requirements.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000800: CAT II) This rule will ensure passwords will not be reused from the previous five changes.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sndmailhelpfile
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004540: CAT II) This rule will disable sendmail help command.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_dodaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002660,GEN002720,GEN002740, GEN002760,GEN002800,GEN002820,GEN002825: CAT II, GEN002750,GEN002751,GEN002752,GEN002753: CAT III) Enable dodaudit: Enables bin auditing for DoD.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disablecde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005260,GEN009340: CAT II) This rule will disable X Window System connections and Xserver login manager.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disableX
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005160,GEN005200,GEN005220, GEN005240: CAT I and II) This rule will disable X Window System programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_dodsecuretcpip
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX00040: CAT II) The securetcpip command must be used.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rotateauditdod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002860: CAT II) Audit logs must be rotated daily.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sedconfigdod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003540: CAT II) The system must implement non-executable program stacks.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_trust
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (AIX00020,AIX00060,GEN000140,GEN000220, GEN006480,GEN006560,GEN008380,GEN002400: CAT II) The system must be checked weekly for unauthorized setuid files and unauthorized modification to authorized setuid files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipv4_gw
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005560: CAT II) Checking if default gateway for IPv4 is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipv6_gw
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005570: CAT II) Checking if default gateway for IPv6 is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_journalutil
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003640: CAT II) Employ journaling on root file system which will ensure system consistency.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_6to4
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007780: CAT II) Unconfigure 6to4 tunnels on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_anonuser
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004820: CAT II) Anonymous FTP must not be active on the system unless authorized.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disableacct
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000760: CAT II) Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshrootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN001120: CAT II) The system must not permit root logins using ssh.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshdaemonprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005500: CAT II) The SSH daemon must be configured to only use the SSHv2 protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshclientprotocol
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005501: CAT II) SSH Client must be configured to only use SSHv2 Protocol.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshlistenaddress
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005504: CAT II) The SSH daemon must only listen on management network addresses unless authorized for uses other than management.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005505,GEN005506: CAT II) The SSH daemon must be configured to only use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshmacs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005507: CAT II) The SSH daemon must be configured to only use Message Authentication Codes (MACs) employing FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hash algorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshclientciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005510,GEN5511: CAT II) The SSH Client must be configured to only use FIPS 140-2 approved ciphers.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshclientmacs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005512: CAT II) The SSH client must be configured to only use Message Authentication Codes (MACs) employing FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hash algorithms.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshAllowGroups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005521: CAT II) The SSH daemon must restrict login ability to specific users and/or groups.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshStrictMode
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005536: CAT II) The SSH daemon must perform strict mode checking of home directory configuration files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sshBanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005550: CAT II) The SSH daemon must be configured with the Department of Defense (DoD) logon banner.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ldapconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple CAT II) Modify ldap.cfg file as per DoD requirements.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sendmaildod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004710: CAT II) Mail relaying must be restricted.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005305,GEN005300,GEN005306: CAT II) SNMP service rules.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_gated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005590: CAT II) The system must not be running any routing protocol daemons unless the system is a router. This rule will disable gated.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_routed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005590: CAT II) The system must not be running any routing protocol daemons unless the system is a router. This rule will disable routed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tcpwrapper
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN006580: CAT II) The system must use an access control program.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_printers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003900: CAT II) The hosts.lpd file (or equivalent) must not contain a plus (+) character.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rminet6
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007700: CAT II) Disable IPv6 protocol handler from network stack unless specified in the /etc/security/pscexpert/ipv6.conf file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN008540: CAT II) The system's local firewall must implement a deny-all allow-by-exception policy.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsecshunports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN008520: CAT II) The system must employ a local firewall. Guard host against port scans: Shuns vulnerable ports for 5 minutes to guard the host against port scans.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_fpmdodfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple GEN items: CAT II) Change permissions of files and directories as applicable per DoD STIG guideline.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chowndodfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple GEN items: CAT II) Change ownership of files and directories as applicable per DoD STIG guideline.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SecureLPM
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Required for LPM on AIX: Enable automated IPSEC Tunnel creation between VIO Servers during live partition migration.
